item.title: [525/508] Blank quest tab customizable template
item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

DAn0194:

This can be done so much better and easier.

I’m not stopping you from posting a better solution. Go for it. My snippet was intended to be noob-friendly anyway, as I ain’t much of a Java programmer myself.

Read full topic

item.title: [525/508] Blank quest tab customizable template
item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

Hey ya’ll, was working on my 525 and spent a while ordering the quest tab strings in order how they appear on the quest tab. So I decided to release the full list so anyone else who wants to use it can without spending ages working out which string goes where

I’m pretty sure this works on 508s too but give me a shout if I’m wrong and I’ll edit it.

Here’s what it looks like for a taster:

And here’s the template coding (may need to convert).

		sendString("", 274, 5);	//Big text on this string	
		sendString("", 274, 12);
		sendString("", 274, 13);
		sendString("", 274, 14);
		sendString("", 274, 15);
		sendString("", 274, 16);
		sendString("", 274, 17);
		sendString("", 274, 18);
		sendString("", 274, 19);
		sendString("", 274, 20);
		sendString("", 274, 21);
		sendString("", 274, 22);
		sendString("", 274, 23);
		sendString("", 274, 24);
		sendString("", 274, 25);
		sendString("", 274, 26);
		sendString("", 274, 27);
		sendString("", 274, 28);
		sendString("", 274, 29);
		sendString("", 274, 30);

        sendString("", 274, 31); //Big text on this string
